caption.center: S.J., a juvenile, Appellant, v. The State of Florida, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Third District.

opinion.posture: An appeal conducted pursuant to Anders v. California,386 U.S. 738 (1967), from the Circuit Court for Miami-Dade County, Roger A. Silver, Judge, Lower Tribunal No. 08-1858.
opinion.attorneys:
S.J., a juvenile, in proper person.
Bill McCollum, Attorney General, for appellee.
opinion.panel: Before GERSTEN, SHEPHERD, and SALTER, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
Affirmed.
Not final until disposition of timely filed motion for rehearing.Page 681
